mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CD , BASE_CD_NM , BASE_CD_ABBR , BASE_GROUP_CD , BASE_CD_DESC , ETC1 , ETC2 , ETC3 , ETC4 , ETC5 , ETC6 , ETC7 , ETC8 , ETC9 , ETC10 , USE_YN_CD ,(SELECT BASE_CD_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='024' AND B.BASE_CD = A.USE_YN_CD) USE_YN_NM , REG_ID , REG_DATE , UPD_ID , UPD_DATE FROM TB_LOCATION_CODE A WHERE BASE_GROUP_CD=#{baseGroupCd} AND BASE_CD=#{baseCd}
SELECT ISNULL(RIGHT('000' + CAST( (CASE ISNUMERIC(MAX(BASE_CD)) WHEN 1 THEN MAX(BASE_CD) ELSE 0 END) +1 AS NVARCHAR),3), '001') BASE_CD FROM TB_LOCATION_CODE WHERE base_group_cd = #{baseGroupCd};
